objects.specification: A large teacher’s desk crafted from dark wood with a polished veneer surface, featuring a modesty panel and sturdy straight legs. Dimensions approximately 1.8 meters wide, 0.8 meters deep, and 0.75 meters tall. The desk has smooth rounded edges and a rich, warm finish.

An ergonomic office chair with a padded seat and back upholstered in dark fabric, featuring adjustable height, a five-star metal base with caster wheels, and armrests. Dimensions roughly 0.6 by 0.6 meters footprint and 1.1 meters tall overall.

A large magnetic whiteboard with a matte white writing surface and a slim aluminum frame. Dimensions are approximately 4 meters wide by 1.5 meters tall, with a 5-centimeter depth profile. The surface allows easy dry-erase marking and erasing.
A ceiling-mounted digital projector in a white plastic casing with ventilation grilles and a protruding lens at the front. Dimensions approximately 30 cm wide, 20 cm tall, and 30 cm deep.
A tall wooden bookshelf finished in dark wood tone, featuring five evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted books. Overall dimensions approximately 1 meter wide, 2 meters tall, and 0.3 meters deep.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a white-painted frame. Dimensions roughly 2 meters wide by 1.5 meters tall with a 10-centimeter frame depth.
Light fabric curtains in a neutral off-white tone, draped to each side of the window and tied back. Each panel is approximately 1.1 meters wide and 1.6 meters tall.
A simple round wall clock with a white face, black numerals and tick marks, thin black frame, and minimalist black hour and minute hands. Diameter around 30 centimeters.
A medium-sized potted plant with lush green foliage in a simple ceramic pot. Overall height about 1.2 meters and pot diameter about 0.5 meters.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light fixture with a diffuse white cover providing bright, even illumination. Diameter about 40 centimeters.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light fixture with a diffuse white cover providing bright, even illumination. Diameter about 40 centimeters.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light fixture with a diffuse white cover providing bright, even illumination. Diameter about 40 centimeters.
A recessed circular LED ceiling light fixture with a diffuse white cover providing bright, even illumination. Diameter about 40 centimeters.
A small dark gray plastic waste bin with smooth sides and an open top. Dimensions approximately 30 cm wide, 50 cm tall, and 30 cm deep.
A small dark gray plastic waste bin with smooth sides and an open top. Dimensions approximately 30 cm wide, 50 cm tall, and 30 cm deep.
An educational poster printed on matte paper featuring colorful charts and diagrams, mounted on a thin foam board backing. Dimensions about 50 cm wide and 70 cm tall.
An educational poster printed on matte paper featuring colorful charts and diagrams, mounted on a thin foam board backing. Dimensions about 50 cm wide and 70 cm tall.
An educational poster printed on matte paper featuring colorful charts and diagrams, mounted on a thin foam board backing. Dimensions about 50 cm wide and 70 cm tall.
An educational poster printed on matte paper featuring colorful charts and diagrams, mounted on a thin foam board backing. Dimensions about 50 cm wide and 70 cm tall.

A rectangular student desk with a light wood veneer tabletop showing subtle grain, smooth rounded edges, and a modesty panel beneath. Four straight metal legs with matching wood finish. Dimensions roughly 1.2 meters wide, 0.6 meters deep, and 0.75 meters tall.

A student chair with a metal tubular frame and a molded plastic seat and backrest in a mid-tone blue finish. Seat height about 0.45 meters, backrest reaches 0.85 meters high. Matte texture for durability.
